about.title: I'm Software Engineer
descr: I like all things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between, so i'm developing with passion any kind of web-applications or web-sites with minimalistic design and simplicity. My goal is to build products with high perfomanse and quality.

Well-organised and person, independent employee with high attention to details, problem solver and perfectionist. Fan of sport, any outdoor activities, also like reading literature about marketing & psychology.

Graduated from university have a bachelor's degree in economic cybernetics as well as a master's degree in economic informatics, has sience work about spreading information in social networks (data analysis & forecast).
I have been developing for more than 3 years and open to new directions and opportunities.

directions.title: Web-development
directions.descr: Creating web-applications (spa, ssr), responsive and cross-browser sites, working with different APIs.

directions.title: UX/UI design
directions.descr: Design minimalist and simple sites with big variety of animation effects.

directions.title: Analytics
directions.descr: Since I graduated from economic-cybernetics, I can analyze the data and draw conclusions based on them, build various models of processes.

services.sectionNote: Of course, I can provide other services that are related to the Internet, just contact me for the further details

services.title: Design
services.descr: Design simple and minimalistic UI/UX interfaces (Figma)

services.title: Development
services.descr: Development web applications and sites with modern technologies (ReactJS, VueJS)

services.title: Seo
services.descr: Promotion of sites as SEO in different search engines (Google, Yandex)

services.title: Support
services.descr: Support for existing projects bug fixing (WordPress, OpenCart, AEM)

skills.title: Work experience
descr: The main side of my experience in web is front-end side (client side of the web).

HTML5, CSS3, JS, building small and medium web apps with VueJS or ReactJS, features, animations, working with APIs, creating and designing responsive web-sites. Also engaged in websites promotion as SEO (Google, Yandex). Have experience working with such CMS as Wordpress, OpenCart, AEM.

Have a large plenty of freelance projects with various stack including full-stack development (NodeJS, NuxtJS, Express, MongoDb). As well as I worked in start-up company that was engaged in the search and sale of tickets for any kind off transport. Now I'm working in a large outsourcing company.
All my skills and stack which I used while developing is placed on a cube.

contacts.descr: I am interested in freelance opportunitie. However, if you have other request or question, just fill the form, and I'll try my best to get back to you!
